name: Auth Server for Springshare
description: A simple server with Node/Express that will authorize and get results from LibCal/Libguides APIs. Please note, neither I nor this code is affiliated with or sponsored by Springshare.

LIBCAL_CLIENT_ID.description: Likely a 3 digit number. Can be found in the LibCal API interface under the Authentication tab.

LIBCAL_CLIENT_SECRET.description: A big long bit of gibberish. Can be found in the LibCal API interface under the Authentication tab.

LIBGUIDES_CLIENT_ID.description: Likely a 3 digit number. Can be found in the LibGuides API interface under the Authentication tab.

LIBGUIDES_CLIENT_SECRET.description: A big long bit of gibberish. Can be found in the LibGuides API interface under the Authentication tab.
